statements: SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_type FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_version = 'v2.0';
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_type, created_at FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_type = 'Firewall' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT firewall_name FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_type LIKE '%Wall%' ORDER BY firewall_name DESC;
SELECT firewall_name FROM firewall_configurations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_type = 'firewall' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_type FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_version LIKE 'v%'
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND firewall_type = 'antivirus'
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_version FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_type IN ('firewall', 'antivirus')
SELECT DISTINCT firewall_type FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_version = 'v1.0' ORDER BY firewall_type ASC
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations;
SELECT name, description FROM firewall_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE port_number = 80;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM firewall_configurations WHERE name LIKE 'Firewall%';
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM firewall_configurations WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT rule_name, port_number FROM firewall_rules WHERE allow_access = TRUE ORDER BY port_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE source_ip LIKE '%192.168%';
SELECT id, name, description, created_at FROM firewall_configurations WHERE name LIKE '%firewall%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations;
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_type FROM firewall_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT rule_name FROM firewall_rules WHERE action = 'ALLOW' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM firewall_logs WHERE firewall_rule_id = 5 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations;
SELECT firewall_name, firewall_description FROM firewall_configurations WHERE firewall_type = 'Custom';
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE action = 'Allow' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM firewall_logs WHERE firewall_rule_id IN (SELECT id FROM firewall_rules WHERE action = 'Block');
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations;
SELECT id, name, description FROM firewall_configurations WHERE id = 2;
SELECT rule_name, rule_action FROM firewall_rules WHERE configuration_id = 3 ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM rule_users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT rule_id, user_id, timestamp, log_description FROM rule_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_configurations;
SELECT rule_name, rule_action FROM firewall_rules WHERE configuration_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM rule_users WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_description, timestamp FROM rule_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT configuration_id, AVG(rule_id) AS avg_rule_id FROM firewall_rules GROUP BY configuration_id;
SELECT * FROM firewall_configs;
SELECT name, description FROM firewall_configs ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT rule_name, protocol, source_ip, destination_ip, port, action FROM firewall_rules WHERE action='ALLOW';
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM rule_actions WHERE action_id > 5;
SELECT category_name FROM rule_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM rule_categories;
SELECT rule_name, protocol, source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE action='ALLOW';
SELECT id, name, description FROM firewall_configs ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, action FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol='TCP' AND port=80;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_info FROM rule_logs WHERE rule_id=5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
